Our Mission

Fenix is a private membership network to support Asian American Women executives in the (AAW) investment industry. We promote diversity initiatives through access to top-tier curated capital connection events and executive advancement opportunities.

Breaking biases
for women in
venture capital

seat at the table

Empowering
Diverse
Founders

Click here

Our Team

Fenix is founded by two Asian American women that have first-hand experience of the demands of being an investor, a fund partner, and an entrepreneur. They came together on their passions to advance AAPI women as leaders in industries where AAPI are underrepresented. Fenix serves as the catalyst for changing the diversity and business landscape.

Diane Yoo

40+ early stage consumer tech investments
2 investments combined valuation $3B
IR professional with $20MM in startup funding
3x Venture Capital Fund Founder

Shveta E. Pillai

20+ yrs Advising C-suite, senior executives, and entrepreneurs
10+ years human capital consulting for Fortune 50 and 500 organizations
Co-Founded Asian Women Executive Lifestyle media platform
ICF Certified PCC Level Executive Coach

Membership

Members are senior level Asian American women investment managers and is by invitation only.

  • General Partner
  • Managing Partner
  • Principal
  • Chief Investment Office
  • Managing Director
  • Director
  • Vice President
  • Head of Investments
Benifits
  • Investor Networking. Institutional, Family Officers, and High Net Worth Investor support women led funds.
  • Executive Advancement. C-suite and board seat opportunities.
  • Fenix Circles. Intimate events with other high performing AAW Investment Managers.
  • Executive Coaching. Executive and leadership coaching to achieve next level performance.
  • Fen-Well Programs. Programming on topics impacting a women's career, health, and wellness.
